description: Template for a NextJS+ExpressJS web app

scripts.install-mkcert: brew install mkcert && brew install nss && mkcert -install
scripts.generate-mkcert: mkdir mkcert cd mkcert && mkcert localhost && cd ..
scripts.build: yarn run install-mkcert && yarn run generate-mkcert && next build
